solution_code:
from typing import List
import numpy as np

def area_comparison(contour1: List[List[int]], contour2: List[List[int]]) -> float:
    area1 = 0.5 * np.abs(np.dot(np.array(contour1)[:, 0], np.roll(np.array(contour1)[:, 1], 1)) - np.dot(np.array(contour1)[:, 1], np.roll(np.array(contour1)[:, 0], 1)))
    
    # Calculate the area of the second contour in a similar way
    area2 = 0.5 * np.abs(np.dot(np.array(contour2)[:, 0], np.roll(np.array(contour2)[:, 1], 1)) - np.dot(np.array(contour2)[:, 1], np.roll(np.array(contour2)[:, 0], 1)))

    # Calculate the absolute difference in areas
    difference = abs(area1 - area2)

    return difference
